an2.130-140:4.2: ‘May I be like Sāriputta and Moggallāna!’
an2.130-140:4.3: These are a standard and a measure for my monk disciples, that is, Sāriputta and Moggallāna.”
an2.130-140:6.2: ‘May I be like the nuns Khemā and Uppalavaṇṇā!’
an2.130-140:6.3: These are a standard and a measure for my nun disciples, that is, the nuns Khemā and Uppalavaṇṇā.
an2.130-140:8.2: ‘May I be like the householder Citta and Hatthaka of Aḷavī!’
an2.130-140:8.3: These are a standard and a measure for my male lay followers, that is, the householder Citta and Hatthaka of Aḷavī.”
an2.130-140:10.2: ‘May I be like the laywomen Khujjuttarā and Veḷukaṇṭakī, Nanda’s mother!’
an2.130-140:10.3: These are a standard and a measure for my female lay disciples, that is, the laywomen Khujjuttarā and Veḷukaṇṭakī, Nanda’s mother.”
an2.130-140:12.1: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person has two qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an2.130-140:12.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism and they criticize those deserving of praise.
an2.130-140:12.4: When a foolish, incompetent bad person has these two qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an2.130-140:13.1: When an astute, competent good person has two qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much merit.
an2.130-140:13.3: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism and they praise those deserving of praise.
an2.130-140:13.4: When an astute, competent good person has these two qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much merit.”
an2.130-140:15.1: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person has two qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an2.130-140:15.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, they arouse faith in things that are dubious, and they don’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
an2.130-140:15.4: When a foolish, incompetent bad person has these two qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
an2.130-140:16.1: When an astute, competent good person has two qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much merit.
an2.130-140:16.3: After examining or scrutinizing, they don’t arouse faith in things that are dubious, and they do arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
an2.130-140:16.4: When an astute, competent good person has these two qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much merit.”
an2.130-140:18.1: “When a foolish, incompetent bad person acts wrongly toward two people they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they make much bad karma.
